helpdesk_ticket.description:
OFFICE OF THE DCP IFSO

Sec 16C Dwarka, DELHI -110078

   

Case FIR 121/25                             Date- 30.11.2025                     Police Station – Spl Cell 

 

Notice u/s 94 BNSS

 

To

      The Nodal / Legal officer

             

Subject: Information required in a transaction made in the above-mentioned case.

Sir,

          It is submitted that the Case mentioned above was related to the digital arrest During the investigation these mobile blow mention mobile numbers surfaced which is using your service

 

Target Numbers - 8451902900 & 8249693534​

 

 

It is requested to provide the below-mentioned details kindly:-

 

1.     Provide the KYC and all the complete contact & account details of the above-mentioned number

 

2.     Provide the registered mail ID of the beneficiary of this account and IP address from which this account is being operated.

 

3.     Kindly provide all the transaction history/Statement of the above-mentioned beneficiary account from till opening of the account to till date

 

4.     Any attached bank Account or Card with this account  

 

5.     Kindly provide the Device ID (IMEI) for this account (If available)

 

6.     Any other useful information from your side, which could be useful in tracing of beneficiary.

 

 

Note: Non-Compliance of this notice will attract the legal proceedings U/s 175 IPC.

 







Regards:-



Suresh Baghel

9911591157

mailto:suresh.28100421@delhipolice.gov.in 



Disclaimer:

This e-mail and its attachments may contain official Indian Government information. If you are not the intended recipient, please notify the sender immediately and delete this e-mail. Any dissemination or use of this information by a person other than the intended recipient is unauthorized. The responsibility lies with the recipient to check this email and any attachment for the presence of viruses.

 

अस्वीकरण:

इस ई-मेल और इसके अनुलग्नकों में भारत सरकार की आधिकारिक जानकारी हो सकती है। यदि आप इच्छित प्राप्तकर्ता नहीं हैं, तो कृपया प्रेषक को तुरंत सूचित करें और इस ई-मेल को हटा दें। इच्छित प्राप्तकर्ता के अलावा किसी अन्य व्यक्ति द्वारा इस जानकारी का कोई प्रसार या उपयोग अनधिकृत है। इस ईमेल और वायरस की उपस्थिति के लिए किसी भी अटैचमेंट की जांच करने की जिम्मेदारी प्राप्तकर्ता की होती है।
--

notes.body:
Merged from ticket 22287561  
      Subject: Missing Item in Delivered Order – Immediate Refund & Compensation Required | Order ID: 657082298507530240  
      Description:   
 Dear PharmEasy Customer Care Team, 
 I am writing this email to express my serious disappointment and frustration regarding my recent order, which was delivered with a missing item PharmEasy Orthopaedic Electric Heat Belt – Extra Large, and despite multiple assurances, no resolution has been provided till date. Please find the attachment for the Order Details.
 
 I immediately contacted your customer care, and your executive confirmed that the issue would be resolved within 24 to 48 hours. However, even after the promised timeline has passed, I have not received any updated resolution. 
 This level of negligence, delay, and lack of follow-up is extremely unprofessional and unacceptable from a platform of PharmEasy’s stature. I trusted your service for essential health-related products, and this experience has completely eroded that trust. 
 Expecting Immediate refund of the full amount paid for the missing electric heat belt with Additional compensation as a customer-care gesture for this hassle. 
 Please treat this matter as URGENT and provide a clear written confirmation of the refund and compensation timeline. 
 Awaiting your prompt action. 
 Regards, Kalpesh Patne 9004510026  
 
 
  

 
 Disclaimer: 
 This email contains proprietary, business-confidential, and/or privileged material. The information contained in this e-mail is intended solely for the use of the individual to whom it is addressed. If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any disclosure, copying, distribution or action in relation to the contents of this email is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful and request you to permanently delete this message and any attachments herein. You are requested to advise the sender, of your receipt of this email by return e-mail. The Company and its affiliates rule out any and every liability resulting from this or any other electronic transmission.

notes.body: Hello,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regard to your order #657082298507530240, I understand your concern. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused, and I will surely assist you with the same.     As checked, your concern is already highlighted to the Escalations team. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them. For any update, you can refer to the escalated ticket #22280987.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

Hello,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regard to your order #657082298507530240, I understand your concern. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused, and I will surely assist you with the same.

As checked, your concern is already highlighted to the Escalations team. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them. For any update, you can refer to the escalated ticket #22280987.

I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

With regard to your order #656876526405066752-27896, I understand your query related to the return request for BLYNDS PRO SPF 80+ SUNSCREENGEL TUBE OF 50GM. notes.body_html:
Hello Satyanarayana,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regard to your order #656876526405066752-27896, I understand your query related to the return request for BLYNDS PRO SPF 80+ SUNSCREENGEL TUBE OF 50GM. I am sorry to inform you that the requested medicine comes under a non-returnable medicine/item. Hence, we will be unable to return the requested medicine or process a refund. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you.

As per PharmEasy's return policy, an item marked as "non-returnable" on the product detail page or medicines whose return window has expired cannot be returned. Hence, I am sorry to inform you that we will be unable to comply with your request to return this item.
​
For more details on our return policy, you can refer to the link: https://pharmeasy.in/help/returns-43000349468

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!

Regards,
Habiba

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear PharmEasy Customer Support Team,

My name is Suroma Pal, and my registered mobile number is 8942912385.

I am writing to express a severe grievance and disappointment regarding a
recent order and the subsequent handling of my complaint.

On December 10th, I placed an order for multiple medicines. Upon receiving
the delivery, I immediately noticed that one critical item, Kerendia 10mg,
was missing from the package.

I raised a complaint and was initially advised to wait 24-48 hours for an
update.

After the stipulated 48 hours passed, I contacted your customer support
again. To my utter shock and dismay, I was informed that a refund or
replacement would not be processed because your team had allegedly "checked
the footages" and concluded the item was included.

This conclusion not only unjustly denies me the medicine I paid for and
urgently require but also essentially defames me and accuses me of lying. I
find this response and implication completely unacceptable, especially from
a company dealing with essential healthcare needs.

I have spent my hard-earned money on this product, and I view this entire
situation as a clear case of product deficiency and poor customer service.
I must stress that this is one of the worst consumer experiences I have
ever had.

I demand an immediate, transparent, and fair resolution to this matter,
which must include a full refund for the missing Kerendia 10mg medicine.

Please note that if this issue is not resolved immediately and
satisfactorily, I will not hesitate to escalate this matter to higher
consumer protection authorities, as this appears to be an unethical
practice impacting the essential needs and hard-earned money of a common
person.

I expect a substantive response and confirmation of the refund process
within 24 hours.

Sincerely,
Suroma Pal
Mobile: 8942912385

--

disclosure, copying, distribution or action in relation to the contents of

permanently delete this message and any attachments herein. You are 
requested to advise the sender, of your receipt of this email by return

resulting from this or any other electronic transmission.

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear PharmEasy Customer Support Team,

My name is Suroma Pal, and my registered mobile number is 8942912385.

I am writing to express a severe grievance and disappointment regarding a
recent order and the subsequent handling of my complaint.

On December 10th, I placed an order for multiple medicines. Upon receiving
the delivery, I immediately noticed that one critical item, Kerendia 10mg,
was missing from the package.

I raised a complaint and was initially advised to wait 24-48 hours for an
update.

After the stipulated 48 hours passed, I contacted your customer support
again. To my utter shock and dismay, I was informed that a refund or
replacement would not be processed because your team had allegedly "checked
the footages" and concluded the item was included.

This conclusion not only unjustly denies me the medicine I paid for and
urgently require but also essentially defames me and accuses me of lying. I
find this response and implication completely unacceptable, especially from
a company dealing with essential healthcare needs.

I have spent my hard-earned money on this product, and I view this entire
situation as a clear case of product deficiency and poor customer service.
I must stress that this is one of the worst consumer experiences I have
ever had.

I demand an immediate, transparent, and fair resolution to this matter,
which must include a full refund for the missing Kerendia 10mg medicine.

Please note that if this issue is not resolved immediately and
satisfactorily, I will not hesitate to escalate this matter to higher
consumer protection authorities, as this appears to be an unethical
practice impacting the essential needs and hard-earned money of a common
person.

I expect a substantive response and confirmation of the refund process
within 24 hours.

Sincerely,
Suroma Pal
Mobile: 8942912385

--

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Urgent Complaint Regarding Missing Medicine (Kerendia 10mg) - Mobile: 8942912385
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear PharmEasy Customer Support Team,

My name is Suroma Pal, and my registered mobile number is 8942912385.

I am writing to express a severe grievance and disappointment regarding a recent order and the subsequent handling of my complaint.

On December 10th, I placed an order for multiple medicines. Upon receiving the delivery, I immediately noticed that one critical item, Kerendia 10mg, was missing from the package.

I raised a complaint and was initially advised to wait 24-48 hours for an update.

After the stipulated 48 hours passed, I contacted your customer support again. To my utter shock and dismay, I was informed that a refund or replacement would not be processed because your team had allegedly "checked the footages" and concluded the item was included.

This conclusion not only unjustly denies me the medicine I paid for and urgently require but also essentially defames me and accuses me of lying. I find this response and implication completely unacceptable, especially from a company dealing with essential healthcare needs.

I have spent my hard-earned money on this product, and I view this entire situation as a clear case of product deficiency and poor customer service. I must stress that this is one of the worst consumer experiences I have ever had.

I demand an immediate, transparent, and fair resolution to this matter, which must include a full refund for the missing Kerendia 10mg medicine.

Please note that if this issue is not resolved immediately and satisfactorily, I will not hesitate to escalate this matter to higher consumer protection authorities, as this appears to be an unethical practice impacting the essential needs and hard-earned money of a common person.

I expect a substantive response and confirmation of the refund process within 24 hours.

Sincerely,
Suroma Pal
Mobile: 8942912385

Dear PharmEasy Grievance Redressal Team,

This is to formally bring to your notice that my complaint regarding Order
ID: 653406328961458176 has not been resolved till date, despite multiple
follow-ups and assurances from your customer support team.

I have complied with all your requirements and submitted the necessary
details/documents within time.And there is no any role of bank as I asked
to there costomer support team they said it's all delay caused by pharmeasy
only.However, the continued delay and lack of resolution amount to
deficiency in service, as defined under the Consumer Protection Act, 2019.

Please treat this email as a final notice. I hereby demand that the issue
be resolved immediately, and a clear written confirmation of the resolution
be shared with me within 7 days from the date of this email.

Failing which, I shall be constrained to initiate appropriate legal
proceedings by filing a complaint before the District Consumer Disputes
Redressal Commission, without any further notice to you. Please note that
in such a case, PharmEasy shall be solely responsible for all legal costs
and consequences arising therefrom.

I expect your prompt action in this matter to avoid further escalation.

Yours sincerely,
Sabir Arif Sayyad
Registered Mobile No:9922188191
Registered Email ID: sabirsayyad1711@gmail.com
Order ID:653406328961458176

helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear PharmEasy Grievance Redressal Team,

This is to formally bring to your notice that my complaint regarding Order ID: 653406328961458176 has not been resolved till date, despite multiple follow-ups and assurances from your customer support team.

I have complied with all your requirements and submitted the necessary details/documents within time.And there is no any role of bank as I asked to there costomer support team they said it's all delay caused by pharmeasy only.However, the continued delay and lack of resolution amount to deficiency in service, as defined under the Consumer Protection Act, 2019.

Please treat this email as a final notice. I hereby demand that the issue be resolved immediately, and a clear written confirmation of the resolution be shared with me within 7 days from the date of this email.

Failing which, I shall be constrained to initiate appropriate legal proceedings by filing a complaint before the District Consumer Disputes Redressal Commission, without any further notice to you. Please note that in such a case, PharmEasy shall be solely responsible for all legal costs and consequences arising therefrom.

I expect your prompt action in this matter to avoid further escalation.

Yours sincerely,
Sabir Arif Sayyad
Registered Mobile No:9922188191
Registered Email ID: sabirsayyad1711@gmail.com
Order ID:653406328961458176

Hello Subarata,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #658763552586752000-56227, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 14th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. 

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.

notes.body: Hello Hemen,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   I understand your concern regarding the old prescription deletion. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.   Please be informed, to keep a medical history of the patient, we are unable to remove/delete the prescription from our records. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present when asked for by relevant Governmental authorities.   ​   Kindly confirm the profile update you are referring to so that we may assist you further.  ​   Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Hemen,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
​
I understand your concern regarding the old prescription deletion. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.

Please be informed, to keep a medical history of the patient, we are unable to remove/delete the prescription from our records. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present when asked for by relevant Governmental authorities. 
​
Kindly confirm the profile update you are referring to so that we may assist you further.
​
Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Manisha

notes.body: Hello,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​​   I understand your concern with regard to the discount. I will surely assist you with this.     The discount displayed in the search results is part of our “Best Pricing” feature. To avail this offer, you need to apply the appropriate coupon code, which is shown at the top of the cart page during checkout.     Please note that PharmEasy provides up to 10% product-level discount to all our customers. Further additional discounts can be availed based on the applicable coupon codes or vouchers available at the time of placing the order.  ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
​​
I understand your concern with regard to the discount. I will surely assist you with this.

The discount displayed in the search results is part of our “Best Pricing” feature. To avail this offer, you need to apply the appropriate coupon code, which is shown at the top of the cart page during checkout.

Please note that PharmEasy provides up to 10% product-level discount to all our customers. Further additional discounts can be availed based on the applicable coupon codes or vouchers available at the time of placing the order.
​
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Manisha

helpdesk_ticket.description:
I am writing to formally request the immediate deletion of my entire
account, including all medical records, historical reports, personal data,
and transaction history associated with my registered details (Mobile:
9665681683 / Email: ajaymeq@gmail.com).

I have previously requested this deletion, but your support team refused
without providing a valid statutory justification.

I. Legal Basis for My Request

I am exercising my rights under the following Indian statutes:

1. Right to Erasure (Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023): Under
Section 12 of the DPDP Act, I have the right to request the erasure of my
personal data.

2. Withdrawal of Consent (IT Rules, 2011): Under Rule 5(7) of the
Information Technology (Reasonable Security Practices and Procedures and
Sensitive Personal Data or Information) Rules, 2011, I hereby withdraw my
consent for the processing, storage, and retention of any and all sensitive
personal data associated with my history on your platform.

II. Demand for Clarification or Compliance

If you refuse to delete my complete history, you are legally required to
provide a specific justification. A vague statement that you "cannot"
delete the data is legally insufficient.

If you claim you are required to retain specific parts of my history under
the National Medical Commission (NMC) Regulations or for tax purposes, I
demand that you:

1. Cite the specific statute and section you are relying upon for retention.

2. Confirm the exact retention period after which this data will be
permanently purged.

3. Immediately restrict all processing of my data. Confirm in writing that
my account has been deactivated and my data moved to a "blocked" or
"archive" state, inaccessible to your marketing teams, third-party
analytics, or general staff.

III. Notice of Further Action

Failure to comply with this request or to provide a valid statutory reason
for refusal within 72 hours will leave me with no choice but to:

1. File a formal complaint with the Data Protection Board of India.

2. Initiate proceedings in the Consumer Court for deficiency of service and
violation of privacy rights.

I expect a prompt and written confirmation that my entire history has been
erased or a detailed legal justification for its retention.

--

helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
I am writing to formally request the immediate deletion of my entire account, including all medical records, historical reports, personal data, and transaction history associated with my registered details (Mobile: 9665681683 / Email: ajaymeq@gmail.com).
I have previously requested this deletion, but your support team refused without providing a valid statutory justification.
I. Legal Basis for My Request
I am exercising my rights under the following Indian statutes:
1. Right to Erasure (Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023): Under Section 12 of the DPDP Act, I have the right to request the erasure of my personal data.
2. Withdrawal of Consent (IT Rules, 2011): Under Rule 5(7) of the Information Technology (Reasonable Security Practices and Procedures and Sensitive Personal Data or Information) Rules, 2011, I hereby withdraw my consent for the processing, storage, and retention of any and all sensitive personal data associated with my history on your platform.
II. Demand for Clarification or Compliance
If you refuse to delete my complete history, you are legally required to provide a specific justification. A vague statement that you "cannot" delete the data is legally insufficient.
If you claim you are required to retain specific parts of my history under the National Medical Commission (NMC) Regulations or for tax purposes, I demand that you:
1. Cite the specific statute and section you are relying upon for retention.
2. Confirm the exact retention period after which this data will be permanently purged.
3. Immediately restrict all processing of my data. Confirm in writing that my account has been deactivated and my data moved to a "blocked" or "archive" state, inaccessible to your marketing teams, third-party analytics, or general staff.
III. Notice of Further Action
Failure to comply with this request or to provide a valid statutory reason for refusal within 72 hours will leave me with no choice but to:
1. File a formal complaint with the Data Protection Board of India.
2. Initiate proceedings in the Consumer Court for deficiency of service and violation of privacy rights.
I expect a prompt and written confirmation that my entire history has been erased or a detailed legal justification for its retention.

notes.body: Hello Pankaj Aswal,    Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #658879323593793536-55437.     We have received an update from our logistics team that your order has been delivered. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.     Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,   PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Pankaj Aswal,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #658879323593793536-55437.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards, 
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Jishna,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  I understand your concern with regard to the 659166322799194112-61702 and others. I will surely assist you with this.  As per our records, the payments were made on 15th December 2025 at 01:34 PM and 01:35 PM. However, your two shipments 659166322799194112-61702 and 659166322799194112-40374 were dispatched prior to this time under the Cash on Delivery (COD) payment mode.  Due to this, refunds of ₹1,353.72 and ₹335.92 have been initiated from our side today.  We regret to inform you that we are unable to adjust the wallet amount against this order at this stage. Kindly place a new order and use the entire wallet balance at checkout for a smooth delivery experience.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.       Regards,  Devdas.
notes.body_html:
Hello Jishna,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I understand your concern with regard to the 659166322799194112-61702 and others. I will surely assist you with this.

As per our records, the payments were made on 15th December 2025 at 01:34 PM and 01:35 PM. However, your two shipments 659166322799194112-61702 and 659166322799194112-40374 were dispatched prior to this time under the Cash on Delivery (COD) payment mode.

Due to this, refunds of ₹1,353.72 and ₹335.92 have been initiated from our side today.

We regret to inform you that we are unable to adjust the wallet amount against this order at this stage. Kindly place a new order and use the entire wallet balance at checkout for a smooth delivery experience.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Devdas.

notes.body: Hello Maheep,     Greetings from PharmEasy!        I am sorry to hear that you wish to delete your account with PharmEasy. Please note that currently, we do not have a facility to delete the account from our database;      however, we can deactivate your account. We will be unable to activate it later, and it will be deactivated permanently. After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account    Kindly confirm so that we can proceed with the request.     Awaiting your earliest response.     Regards,  Habiba

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear PharmEasy Customer Support Team,

I am writing to express my serious concern regarding my request for
return/refund of medicines ordered through PharmEasy, for which I had opted
for the *generic alternatives suggested on your platform*.

Unfortunately, these generic medicines turned out to be *clinically
unsuitable for the patient*, and hence could not be consumed. As medicines
are directly related to health and safety, this was an unavoidable
situation and not a casual or arbitrary return request.

I understand your stated *14-day return policy*. However, I am requesting
that you kindly consider this as a *one-time exception*, given the
following circumstances:

   -

   The *order value exceeds ₹4,400*, which is a substantial amount.
   -

   I have been a *loyal PharmEasy customer for over 2 years*, regularly
   placing medicine orders and availing lab tests through your platform.
   -

   The issue arose specifically due to *generic substitutions suggested by
   PharmEasy*, which did not suit the patient.
   -

   The medicines are unused and were not returned only because the medical
   unsuitability became clear over time.

I firmly believe that customer trust and goodwill are built in such
situations, where genuine concerns are addressed with empathy and
flexibility. I am therefore requesting you to *approve a return/refund as a
one-time goodwill gesture*. The refund can be done in my Pharmeasy wallet.
Please find the pictures of the medicines attached and the order details
below.

ORDER ID: 637060268991684608
ORDER ID: 636955962919124992

1. Apigy 5mg Strip of 10 tablets: 17 Qty
2. Esmetru 40mg Strip of 10 tablets: 9 Qty

My Pharmeasy account details:
Name: Raveena
Phone: 8920361094
Email: raveenasingh2018@gmail.com


*Note: *In case this request is not considered, I will be left with no
option but to *discontinue my association with PharmEasy* and explore *legal
remedies, including approaching the Consumer Forum*, as the matter involves
financial loss and patient safety.

I sincerely hope this matter can be resolved amicably and without
escalation. I look forward to a positive and timely response.


Regards,
*Raveena *

--

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Request for One-Time Exception for Return of Unsuitable Generic Medicines – Order Value ₹4,400+
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear PharmEasy Customer Support Team,
I am writing to express my serious concern regarding my request for return/refund of medicines ordered through PharmEasy, for which I had opted for the generic alternatives suggested on your platform.
Unfortunately, these generic medicines turned out to be clinically unsuitable for the patient, and hence could not be consumed. As medicines are directly related to health and safety, this was an unavoidable situation and not a casual or arbitrary return request.
I understand your stated 14-day return policy. However, I am requesting that you kindly consider this as a one-time exception, given the following circumstances:
  • The order value exceeds ₹4,400, which is a substantial amount.
  • I have been a loyal PharmEasy customer for over 2 years, regularly placing medicine orders and availing lab tests through your platform.
  • The issue arose specifically due to generic substitutions suggested by PharmEasy, which did not suit the patient.
  • The medicines are unused and were not returned only because the medical unsuitability became clear over time.
I firmly believe that customer trust and goodwill are built in such situations, where genuine concerns are addressed with empathy and flexibility. I am therefore requesting you to approve a return/refund as a one-time goodwill gesture. The refund can be done in my Pharmeasy wallet. Please find the pictures of the medicines attached and the order details below.

ORDER ID: 637060268991684608
ORDER ID: 636955962919124992

1. Apigy 5mg Strip of 10 tablets: 17 Qty
2. Esmetru 40mg Strip of 10 tablets: 9 Qty

My Pharmeasy account details:
Name: Raveena
Phone: 8920361094
Email: raveenasingh2018@gmail.com

Note: In case this request is not considered, I will be left with no option but to discontinue my association with PharmEasy and explore legal remedies, including approaching the Consumer Forum, as the matter involves financial loss and patient safety.
I sincerely hope this matter can be resolved amicably and without escalation. I look forward to a positive and timely response.

Regards,
Raveena
